timeline.bodyText:
Please fix typo
  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * the composite  of any circuit breaker {@link RateLimiterConfigCustomizer} implementations.

timeline.bodyHTML:
Please fix typo

Suggested change
* the composite of any circuit breaker {@link RateLimiterConfigCustomizer} implementations.
* the composite of any rate limiter {@link RateLimiterConfigCustomizer} implementations.
timeline.author: dlsrb6342

timeline.body: Don't we need to check that there are multiple customizer for same name?
timeline.bodyText: Don't we need to check that there are multiple customizer for same name?
timeline.bodyHTML: Don't we need to check that there are multiple customizer for same name?
timeline.author: dlsrb6342

replies.bodyText: we can throw an exception to show that is not allowed to have more than one customizer per instance name , is this what u r asking for :) ? or i misunderstood ?
replies.author: Romeh

replies.bodyText: Yes right. We can throw an exception or write on docs about supporting just one customizer per instance name.
replies.author: dlsrb6342
